instagram_dm_auto_reply.trigger: New DM received (when unable to respond immediately)
instagram_dm_auto_reply.purpose: Acknowledge inquiry, set expectations, maintain engagement

templates.name: Standard Auto-Reply
templates.message:
Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to [Clinic Name]! We received your message and will get back to you shortly.

In the meantime, check out our services: [website link]

Talk soon!

templates.name: After Hours Auto-Reply
templates.message:
Thanks for your message! We're currently closed but will respond first thing tomorrow morning.

Can't wait? Check out our FAQ: [link]

Have a great evening!

templates.name: High Volume Auto-Reply
templates.message:
Hey! Thanks for messaging us. We're experiencing high volume right now but promise to respond within 2 hours.

Browse our treatments while you wait: [link]

Thank you for your patience!

best_practices: Include a useful link (website, services, FAQ)
Use emojis sparingly to match brand voice

instagram_follower_welcome.purpose: Welcome new followers, introduce clinic, encourage engagement

templates.name: Warm Welcome
templates.message:
Welcome to the [Clinic Name] family! We're so happy to have you here.

We share tips, transformations, and special offers here. Have questions about any of our treatments? Just send us a DM!

templates.name: Welcome with Offer
templates.message:
Thanks for the follow! As a welcome gift, enjoy 10% off your first treatment with us.

Just mention 'INSTA10' when you book. DM us to schedule!

templates.name: Simple Welcome
templates.message: Hey, thanks for following! Excited to share our world of beauty with you. Feel free to reach out anytime with questions!

best_practices: Use sparingly - not every follower needs a DM

whatsapp_welcome_message.trigger: First message from new contact (WhatsApp Business)
whatsapp_welcome_message.purpose: Greet new contact, gather basic info, set next steps

templates.name: Standard Welcome
templates.message:
Hi! Welcome to [Clinic Name]!

Thanks for reaching out. To help you best, could you let us know:

1. What treatment are you interested in?
2. Is this your first visit to us?

We'll get back to you with all the details!

templates.name: Quick Menu Welcome
templates.message:
Hey there! Thanks for contacting [Clinic Name].

How can we help you today?

1 - Learn about our treatments
2 - Get pricing info
3 - Book an appointment
4 - Ask a question

Just reply with a number!

templates.name: Friendly Welcome
templates.message:
Hi! So glad you messaged us!

I'm [Name], and I'll be happy to help you with anything you need. What treatment caught your eye?

best_practices: Respond quickly (WhatsApp users expect fast replies)
Use WhatsApp Business quick replies for common questions

follow_up_sequences.description: Suggested follow-up message templates for different stages

sequences.template: Hi [Name]! Just checking in on your inquiry about [treatment]. Happy to answer any questions you might have. Let me know!
Hey [Name]! It was great chatting about [treatment]. I have some availability opening up this week if you'd like to get started. Want me to send you some times?
Hi [Name]! Following up on the pricing I sent over. Do you have any questions I can help with? I'm here if you need anything!
Hi [Name]! Just wanted to check in and see how you're feeling after your [treatment]. Hope everything is going great! Let us know if you have any questions.
Hi [Name]! It's been a while since we chatted. Just wanted to let you know we're here whenever you're ready. We also have some new [treatments/offers] you might like!
